meanings.definition: In a stubborn or difficult manner
meanings.sent1: She cussedly refused to change her mind about the movie choice.
meanings.sent2: He cussedly insisted on taking the longer route despite the traffic.
meanings.sent3: The cat cussedly sat in the middle of the doorway, refusing to move.
meanings.sent4: The old car cussedly sputtered to life after many attempts.
meanings.sent5: The tree roots cussedly twisted around the buried rock, making it hard to remove.

meanings.definition: Used to emphasize annoyance or frustration
meanings.sent1: Cussedly, I can't believe I forgot my keys again!
meanings.sent2: Oh cussedly, why does this always happen to me?
meanings.sent3: Cussedly, the toast burned just when I was running late.
meanings.sent4: The ball bounced cussedly out of reach, causing a missed catch.
meanings.sent5: Cussedly, the rain started just as I finished washing the car.
